      • getResultList

        List<Object> getResultList(QueryInfo queryInfo,
                         int startPosition,
                         int maxResults)
        Returns list of objects from executing a native query
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - Native query details
        startPosition - The start position of the first result, numbered from 0
        maxResults - Maximum number of results to retrieve, or 0 for no limit
        Returns:
        List<Object>

      • getSingleResult

        Object getSingleResult(QueryInfo queryInfo)
        Returns object from executing a native query
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - Native query details
        Returns:
        Object or null if nothing returned by query
